nodes.text: A very bad thing all around... I would like to see how this turns out.

Well, the Judge made a ruling late last week that she should not be revived should her breathing stop again, backing the medical assessment of her doctors: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/health/3723656.stm And yes, very sad. Another dilemma posed by what has become possible through ever advancing medical science.....
